Eric Schmidt , who previously had been Novell CEO and Sun CTO, has been the public face of Google with his calm, relaxed demeanor, while running the company as a`` triumvirate'' with Page and Sergey Brin . Having Eric Schmidt as the front of Google has been tremendous for Google, and there is no doubt that bringing his perspective has been critical for good decision-making at the company, IDC analyst Al Hilwa said via e-mail.
